description:
Tree works in rear garden subject to TPO Islington No.1 1961 

 Two Poplars (T237 and T238) -  Remove Epicormic growth to 4m                                only Sycamore (T239) - Crown lift 3m, crown thin 35% and                   deadwood Ash: (T240) - Fell Chestnut (T241) - Crown lift 4m, crown thin 25% and deadwood Two sycamores (T242 and T243) - Crown lift 4m, crown thin                                 35% and deadwood Trees of Heaven (T247 and T249) - Crown lift 4m, crown thin                                   25% and deadwood
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS 3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
